page: AG60031: Plant Metabolites And Separation Technology

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to primary and secondary plant metabolites; National and international scenarios on secondary metabolites production technology. Basic principles of separation techniques, strategies of downstream processing with optical references to plant metabolites, different techniques adopted for separation of biomolecules, Chromatographic separation process, scale-up methods, large scale purification of biomolecules, electrophoresis, chromatofocussing, supercritical fluid extraction, Liquid-liquid extraction, UF, aquous two phase separation, IMAC, GFC, IEC, Pseudo-biospecific affinity chromatography, HIC, covalent chromatography, capillary electrophoresis, Rotaphore.
page: AG60031: Plant Metabolites And Separation Technology
